name: get_server_dependencies
description: Retrieves the dependency map showing which critical systems and services depend on a specific server

server_id.description: The identifier of the server to analyze dependencies for

include_indirect.description: Whether to include indirect dependencies in the analysis

name: analyze_service_criticality
description: Evaluates the criticality level and business impact of services that would be affected by server downtime

server_id.description: The server identifier to analyze affected services for

time_window.description: Expected duration of outage (e.g., '1h', '4h', '24h') to assess time-based impact

name: get_failover_capabilities
description: Checks available failover mechanisms, backup systems, and recovery options for services on the affected server

server_id.description: The server identifier to check failover options for

service_list.description: Optional list of specific services to check failover for

name: estimate_outage_impact
description: Calculates estimated business impact including affected users, revenue loss, and SLA violations from server outage

server_id.description: The server identifier to estimate impact for
